reviews.review_text: One of the best pizzas I ve had in Vancouver! The truffle mushroom is my favorite. The staff are super friendly and the food is great. There s lots of parking nearby as well. Highly recommend!

I ve ordered from here a few times and it has not disappoint. Their funghi pizza and walnut salad is so good. Also had their Mac n cheese and meatballs; both were tasty. It s a nice spot in Kingsway, but enough for large groups or if you want to study/work as they have bars with outlets. A versatile space and nicely decorated.
Great spot for pizza. Service is quick and it has a nice light atmosphere. The mushroom pizza is to die for. The photo is of the happy hour pizzas (smaller than the normal pizzas).
We went here for a belated Fathers day dinner,  the food was delicious. The service was quick and friendly. I would definitely revisit in the future!

Great place! The Short Ribs alone are something to come back for, and the Pear and Walnut salad was delicious. Portion sizes were much bigger than expected! The bartender was very friendly and energetic. This place has a wonderful atmosphere and I will be back with friends!

Amazing pizza and meatballs! We ve come to Sprezzatura a few times already and we always order the mushroom truffle pizza, which never disappoints. The pizza had a strong hint of truffle flavour and very cheesy. The crust is not overwhelming like other pizza places. The meatballs were very meaty and saucy. Great place for pizza in Vancouver!

Visited for dinner last week and had a wonderful experience. Sprezzatura has a wonderful menu, I ll be back to try more items, and they have also created a beautiful room. I really like the space and the service was excellent. They make a top notch negroni and the spicy lamb pizza is fantastic! Amazing depth to the flavours.

Delicious pizza! The crust was perfectly cooked, the toppings worked so well together, we were pleasantly surprised. The interior has a nice design, lots of seating ,overall a good vibe. We went during an off-peak time so the service was pretty good and we had a window seat which was nice! Would definitely come back if we re ever in the area!

Everything I ate here was amazing. We had the pear and walnut salad, spicy meatball pizza, porcini lasagna and short rib. Also the cocktails were dangerously boozy but my friends and I had a great visit and will be back soon!

Have been loving this amazing space ever since they opened, all their dishes are excellent but the wood-fired pizza and their flavor combos are unmatched. Inside the restaurant is a beautiful space with a warm vibe, and the staff enhance this experience. Thank you!

Great happy hour drinks, the spacious patio is the perfect place to enjoy the sun while indulging in a cold glass of aperol spritz and cannavaro margarita (made with smokey mezcal, balanced with the sweetness and slight bitterness of the aperol and lime   ). Also the meatballs were spectacular.
Our first time visiting and the staff were sooo fun and helpful, food full of flavour. A pepperoni pizza can sound plain but this one is tops, and with a flavour surprise! Go for it.

Went there to pick up a pizza cause its close to my home. Had an interesting chat with the owner and tried the pepperoni pizza. I did a lot of travelling and tried pizza all around the world and this pepperoni was easily in the top 3 of pizzas i have ever eaten. What a great place. definitely will come back for more. Simon

We had lunch. Their service is just on top! Their pizza and salad are both very good! The salad we ordered was surprisingly good. If we eat salads and beans separately, it will be just like normal salad. But once u eat beans and salads together, it turns into four/five times better, like another dishes. We definitely recommend this salad.

Recently hosted my 40th birthday at Sprezzatura. The staff were incredibly helpful with organising all the way through to clean up at the end of the evening. The food and drinks were fantastic, everything youd expect from a quality Italian restaurant. We reserved the space by the bar and it was the perfect area for around 30 people (there is also a smaller private room available). The kitchen had no problem accommodating any dietary restrictions and volume of food. We ordered numerous Pizzas, Antipasti, Olives, and Meatballs. People liked how authentic the Pizzas were. The staff printed labels for the vegan food as well as custom printed drinks menus dotted around the tables. Very happy with the experience provided by all the staff. I look forward to eating there again!

Recommend for best pizza in Van - had prosciutto and arugula which was delicious. Shared some of the Boar pappardelle and some fresh appetizers with the group. The service was warm and welcoming and the ambiance is elegant and cozy - perfect for a date or dinner party. I went with ppl who shared wine, but I myself don t drink, so I appreciated that they had some flavourful mocktail options on their cocktail list.

We went for dinner and had an excellent time! Our waitress was kind and we loved the food. We sat on the patio with our dog and they offered to bring out water right away, which was great. The food was excellent; we split the cacio e pepe and the potato pizza. Id highly recommend dining here. The one comment is that there were moments where the traffic was loud on the Kingsway, but 99% of the time the noise level was much better than I had expected and did not cause any issues.

On the hunt for authentic and delicious Margherita pizza? This place has it! If you really want to stretch your pants, start with the brushetta (so fresh, with lightly garlic rubbed toast...) Blow your diet with the tiramisu. Its worth it!!

Great, thin, and tasty pizza. Best of all is that there s a pet friendly patio. We got s margarita and a pepperoni and spiced honey. The pizzas were thin and a lil crispy on the edges. Service was very friendly too.

Hosted my hubs 40th birthday party on the bar side of the restaurant and it was an excellent setup for a standing mingling party along with seating scattered throughout the space. Food was raved about, along with the cocktails. All the staff were courteous and attentive to our guests needs, as well the preplanning details were handled professionally and communicated in a timely manner. They worked with us on a menu and a budget to make the entire night a success. Would highly recommend!

What a discovery! We checked out this place initially for Happy Hr that turned into a loooong 5 hour dinner. We totally enjoyed the HH negronis which were potent and that led to wine after. The pizza was my fav kind thin Neopolitan style pizza best eaten folded or with a fork totally noms! We followed with some entrees and desserts and long conversations which made a splendid patio evening. Service was spot on and personable! Hope to return next week!!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: We are so glad that you had a great time with us Philip! Hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: First time here and we were not disappointed. We had the meatballs as an appetizer and they were delicious. We ordered the Italian sausage and Rapini pizza. It was so delicious. Another plus is we could sit outside with our doggie. Everyone was so friendly. We would highly recommend. Sorry we ate half the pizza before taking a pic, it was that good.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the kind words John! Hope to see you and your dog back on the patio soon.

reviews.review_text: After reading about this place, we stopped for lunch the other day. Staff was friendly and followed Covid-19 protocol by asking for proof of vaccination. We started by sharing the pear-walnut salad. It was a good size with crisp greens, shredded pear and a nice walnut dressing. I had heard that the meatballs were really good, but we also wanted to try the panuozzo. So we settled on the meatball handheld. This was a huge!  It contained the aforementioned meatballs with arugula, fior de latte, Parmigiano with a fantastic housemade chili mayo. It was a bit messy to eat, but it was delicious! Highly recommended. Lastly, we had the potato and taleggio pizza. Dont let the chunks of garlic scare you.  They were confit, so the result was soft, creamy and sweet. Overall a very enjoyable lunch. Would definitely like to come back to try more!
Excellent service and thin crust pizza! Tasty mushroom pizza. Salads a little bland. Cocktails pricey. Happy hour a good deal.

We love coming to Sprezzatura, the food is amazing, the staff are all so friendly and helpful. We had a larger group booking and everyone was so accommodating! The mushroom pizza is one of my personal favourite pizzas in town.

Chill atmosphere, friendly personnel, delicious pizza and tiramisu. The spiciness of the pepperoni combined very well with the sweetness of the honey. The tiramisu was one of the best ones I had outside of Italy.

Amzing restaurant to definitely try in Vancouver. No pasta on the menu, all main dishes are cooked in the oven. We tried two pizzas, Mushroom and the Spicy Pepperoni. We ended up ordering our third pizza, Mushroom again. It was Mushrooms and Truffles heaven!!! I would give 5/5 for the Mushroom pizza but maybe a 4/5 for the Pepperoni one. We had Ferro Salad and warm olives as appetizers and I would order them again. We also got ourselves a cheese platter, but portion was not big for 5 of us. Overall I would go again and again. I definitely would crave the Mushroom Pizza. Wine comes in glass or 1L open bottles ( half a liter is available too). I feel like management need to think of extra help around the restaurant. It would take us 4-5 mins to find our host. Street Parking is available around the restaurant.

One of my favorite pizza restaurants for dining in. The appetizer options such as carpaccio and arugula salad are a nice enhancement to the pizza meal, the mushroom one is a must try! Great tiramisu as well, and the drink menu has all you can ask for! Definitely worth a visit for dining in!

Super delicious pizza! Nice portion!  And not just that, super friendly staff. We went to celebrate my wifes 30th birthday and took our pup with us as their patio is pet friendly =) They are also really friendly with dogs as it was a hot evening and they brought us a bowl of water specially for our pup! They also added a birthday candle for my wifes cake(which was also really good, one of the best tiramisu Ive had). We found a new favorite place to go when we want to eat pizza anf rake our pup with us! Highly recommended!

A really great Italian place on Kingsway, in the Mount Pleasant neighbourhood! I would actually recommend coming at lunch, so you can try the Panuozzo (handheld Italian sandwich, made with Verache Pizza Napoletana dough). We got the meatball panuozzo (with Calabrian chilli mayo, arugula, balsamic red onions, fior di latte, and parmigiano). Amazing flavour combination! And for pizza, we got the seasonal feature of Pepperoni & Spiced Honey (with tomato, fior di latte, fontina, Ezzo pepperoni, housemade spiced honey, and parmigiano). It mimics the New York-style pepperoni pizzas, and again, delicious. The dough for both the panuozzo and pizzas are incredible, great chew and not too thin or too thick. Pizza portions are reasonable, so can definitely order one per person, while sharing other dishes.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the awesome review Christy, hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Amazing Marguerita/Mushrooom pizzas for dinner on the terrace after a big hiking  ! They really taste like authentic Italian pizzas, we will come back to try the others for sure !
Best pizza in town. I wish they brought back the half price marg happy hours

Absolutely delicious! I had pear and walnut salad which was excellent but others had the prosciutto and arugula pizza and muffuletta which was large enough to share. Pizza is always great! See you again soon.

We had a fantastic evening at Sprezzatura as a larger group and couldnt have been happier with the service, the atmosphere and the food. This has been a go to spot for us to have our parent get togethers and its a hugely popular event. The food is excellent and having the shared buffet in the larger space makes it perfect for mingling and socializing. The dedicated server we had that evening was so attentive and made sure the bills were in order, which was no small feat! Leading up to the event, the reservations crew were incredibly helpful and ensured the evening went well. Highly recommend Sprezzatura! Vegetarian options: Lots of vegetarian and vegan options on offer; gluten-free diets are also accomodated.

We hadnt seen our dinner mates for a long time so we were a little slow in placing our order.  The server was very patient with us.  The food was all excellent. Everyone was satisfied. Vegetarian options: I am vegan but didnt mind the amount of cheese on the squash pizza.....you gotta live, right? Thanks.

Fantastic spot conveniently located in Mt Pleasant with high quality thin Pizzas, Salads, Antipasti and more. Nice drinks menu. Fresh ingredients, delicious food and great service with attention to details. Menu is priced reasonably. As a bonus, the place is kids friendly. Definitely recommended!

This restaurant is always a hit and reliable for a great dining experience! Sprezzatura is a welcome addition to the very vibrant and hip mount pleasant area of Vancouver! The decor, think LA rustic-chic vibe. My weekly go-to is the Margherita pizza. Consistent and absolutely delicious. Perfect dough, non greasy, thin. They have an exceptionally authentic pizza menu along with tasty meatballs! The staff are truly exceptional. Always pleasant! The owners are dedicated folks! They remained open during the hardest months of Covid! Bravo!
Pizza was delicious and loved the ambiance of the restaurant. Definitely somewhere you can go after work for drinks and pizza. Love it
We love this place. A little out of the way but definitely worth it. Everything we tried so far is good and the staff and atmosphere is amazing. Good place for brunch, lunch or dinner.
This was our first meal in Vancouver and it was Outstanding.

Had a late date night here on a Saturday. Andres was our server and he was great. Very friendly and even gave me a tester of a sour beer that I never asked for. Pizza and food was great as well. Love the ambience at night. Would definitely come here again to try the other items on the menu.
Love the tiramisu! Food and service are both good. Comfortable environment.

Mushroom overload!!!! YUM! One of my favourite mushroom pizzas! They dont skimp on the mushrooms which I love. The habanero chili oil is delicious too. Also, the happy hour specials are amazing. Highly recommend!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Linda, we agree that our Mushroom pizza is AMAZING! We hope to see you again soon :)

reviews.review_text: Amazing! We had the meatballs with warm bread for starters (highly recommend getting the bread, its essentially pizza dough with sprinkled parmesan). Then a pepperoni sweet honey pizza. Everything was delicious. Staff was super friendly and the ambience of the restaurant was great for a family or date!
Best thin crust pizza in town. Their mushroom pizza is unbelievable so we keep coming back for it. Great service and open style kitchen
Had the prosciutto panuozzo and it was ridiculously good. The lemon olive radish really made the whole thing pop, and the bread was oh so good. Im definitely going to order it again.

Fantastic evening, as usual, on the new covid safe patio. The meatball pizza is always a star but the bruschetta and italian sausage & rapini won over the table. Great service and extra attention to cleanliness and spacing of guests was seen all night in a conscientious but not intruding manner. Great experience and part of the neighbourhood. Will return often!
Had the mushroom pizza, it was delicious! Thin, light, creamy and cheezy with a generous amount of mushrooms. The place was cozy yet industrial and modern. Was a great experience.

Really flavourful dishes, I was impressed. I had the pepperoni and honey pizza, spicy lamb pizza, the lasagna, meatballs and brussels. The sauce on the meatballs was a standout but they were all individually delicious dishes. Thanks!
If theyve still got their wild boar pasta when you read this then stop reading reviews and go grab a table. The beef carpaccio is not something you want to miss either.

Visited for a late-lunch in mid-November 2022.  I had the Cannelini bean-Arugula salad.  It was excellent!  Others at my table said their pizzas were very good, and they were able to do a minor substitution for one of the pizzas toppings, as requested.  Best to visit on foot.  Parking near here isnt easy.

This is the first time I ve been here. They have a really nice patio, super clean, great seating and lots of umbrellas. The food is really tasty, and the drinks are just as good if not better. We also had really good service from an Irish gentleman. He was really kind and genuine. 5/5 for sure. We will definitely be back.

We came here on a whim and were completely delighted with every aspect of our meal:  the wine, the pizza, the salad, the dessert all superb.  And our waitress was warm and solicitous. Dietary restrictions: There were a couple of gluten free options.

Delicious food and drinks, and service was warm and friendly. We had a lovely time on their patio for lunch a few months ago- the pizza is fantastic and authentic Neapolitan style. Their inside is also spacious and inviting. Will be back again soon.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the positive words Chris!

reviews.review_text: Had dinner there last night, food was absolutely fantastic! Great service and amazing ambiance. One of the servers Andres made our evening with his delightful charm and amazing personality. Well done Sprezzatura!

Excellent food and amazing service! We booked Sprezzatura for my son s special event and everything exceeded our expectations here. Fantastic event and food planning from Danielle at Sprezzatura to ensure our celebration was smooth and perfect. They offer an awesome family menu for larger parties which includes antipasti, pizza and roasts. You will not be disappointed! Definitely recommend. Thanks again Sprezzatura staff for making our son s event unforgettable!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: This an Bianca, we had an amazing time with your group!

reviews.review_text: Girls and I visited Sprezzatura for the first time, great atmosphere and delicious food! Spicy Pepperoni Pizza and Pear/Walnut salad are must tries! Really great service from Emma, she was lovely and on point!
This is a great hidden gem in Mount Pleasant. Great patio with the best Aperol Spritz in town, delicious food and wonderful service. Order the meatballs!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much Leah, glad that you had a great time with us!

reviews.review_text: Sprezz is a neighborhood gem. Staff are superb and the pizzas and sandwiches are delicious. Great for an evening. Kid friendly.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Solomon!

reviews.review_text: Food taste good. Pizza was delicious. The server was very friendly.
Great place!, Andres, our server was amazing, he made super easy for us to make de right choises. He recomended us a great wine, carpaccio to start and the delicous lamb pizza.
Loved the pizzas here! Will be back!

Awesome food and great service. Got the Margherita, Verde and Potato pizza. All 3 were amazing. They have a dog friendly patio. We visited with our dog and the moment we walked in the server was kind enuf to get some water for our dog.

We live very close to this place and hadnt had a chance to make it in yet but Im so glad we did! My husband and I LOVE a good pie and have ate our way through Italy. Let me tell you the Potato & Taleggio pizza was out of this world, we still think about it. Thank you for a lovely evening, what an amazing addition to Mount Pleasant :)
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Happy that you had a great time with us Courtney!

reviews.review_text: Good vibes     good food, really interesting menu and atmosphere. Y de aqui a CIBERTRON a mover el bote!
Dined in twice and I was quite happy with the food. Highly recommend this restaurant if you are in the area. Kid-friendliness: Our preschooler loved the kids menu. Legit Mac and cheese.

I have a great experience every time I come here. The staff are friendly, the service is attentive, and the margherita pizza is excellent. I love the patio and the interior atmosphere too. I really like the Special hot sauce that is Gino s recipe and I got some to take home; Legends Haul carries it and now I am putting it on everything! Sprezzatura is a great neighbourhood restaurant that has been doing everything well, even in the toughest year possible. If you haven t been yet, go!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Diane, we are SO glad to hear that you once again had a great time with us! I will let Gino know that his hot sauce has secured another fan. Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Wonderful ambiance in the restaurant with an open kitchen concept to keep you entertained. The food was delicious and the drinks were good as well. They have really reasonable prices on bottles of wine. The pork belly was perfect. The service was really good even though the server was a little busy she did a great job making sure everything was going smoothly. We went with 10 people and she did a masterful job remembering everyones orders and making sure drinks got refilled when needed.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Armand, We are so happy that you had a great time with us! We hope to see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: Dog friendly patio Good food The patio is pretty comfortable, even though it s beside Kingsway Food : 5/5

Very good food, awesome flavor and the pizza is mwah! We ordered takeout and brought it home and it was fresh and hot. Ready on time and friendly staff. Large portions, great value. Will order again from here for sure!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad that your takeout was great Dawn!

reviews.review_text: We have come here a number of times and the food and service are always brilliant. We came again yesterday for my birthday with a small group of friends and the staff were so accommodating. The pizza is amazing, they have a wonderful happy hour and they gave me a massive slice of free tiramisu for my birthday that we all shared. The owner is hands on, funny and so sweet.

I booked for me and my friend s birthday dinner. This restaurant was only restaurant accepting reservation of more than 6 people. It was very smooth by online booking system. Also they allow us to have own cakes from outside. Moreover, they gave us amazingly delicious tiramisu on the shop!! There were  nothing I can complain and just perfect!!! Of course, pizza we ordered were amazing. Especially, Margarita (Classic right?). It was more like Italian style thin pizza with nice cheeses. But anyway I loved the tiramisu so much! I totally forgot to take pictures of food. But I can garantie you ll have nice and delicious time here. Recommended
reviews.response_from_owner_text: You know that you have had a great time when you forget to take pictures! Glad that you and your friends had a nice time celebrating with us.

reviews.review_text: The happy hour at this restaurant is 10/10. Staff are attentive, have a sense of humour and genuine care for customers. The pizza crust is perfect, classic, Italian with a sense of heartiness. Charcuterie board is great bang for buck and high quality. Will definitely come again and recommend to a friend - a great Mount Pleasant find.

Gorgeous space with ample seating. Highly recommend the pork belly pizza! Was filling yet didn t make me feel heavy and bloated. It was a thin crust type pizza that was nice and cheesy with a hint of citrus undertone. So good! Also the food came pretty quick and the waitress was so nice and friendly.

Tried the arugula salad first and would highly recommend. It was delicious. Service was fast, and friendly enough. The pizza was amazing. One of my favourites pizzas now. The margarita and vegetarian pizzas were full of flavour and had the best crust ever. We came during happy hour, which means each pizza was $5 off, which was surprisingly cheap! Would highly recommend trying pizza here.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Lauren, Glad to hear that you had a great time with us, hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Amazing service. The power temporarily went down while the pizza was being cooked which caused the dough to go bad. They decided to make brand new pizzas and waived the bill entirely for making us wait! The servers were extremely kind and knowledgable about their menu. The thin crust pizza was delicious. Roasted to perfection with fresh toppings. Would 100% come again!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the review Kenneth, sorry again about the power outage! We are glad that you still had a wonderful time with us.

reviews.review_text: This pizza is not big box, discounted standard pizza. This pizza is superb.   Fresh ingredients and gourmet selections.  If you order a pizza with a lot of stuff you will need to eat it with a knife and fork. Service was excellent.  Vegan selections are available. The three of us guys consumed two pizzas at lunch and left more than satisfied.  I would definitely dine here again.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the great feedback Joe, glad you had a great time! Come back and visit us again soon.

reviews.review_text: It was the second time i go to this restaurant and everything was perfect.

We just ordered food from Sprezzatura via Uber eats. We literally just spent the last 5 minutes looking at each other and going OMG  . Were still eating, so Ill write a more detailed review later on, but for now all I can say is this place is simply one of the best Italian restaurants weve ever had the pleasure of ordering food from.

We have been to Sprezzetura and the food and service has always been top-notch. Last night we were there with a group of 13 people and someone individual bills some couples wanted to pay together and it was like the most confusing billing situation ever. The waiter handled it like a champ and had no attitude and was just so wonderful to work with. This is quickly becoming my favorite pizza place in town. I cannot recommend it enough. I love Heathers really big table so you can fit big groups of people and they have a back private room for larger parties.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Rob, So glad to hear that you had a great time with us last night! Thanks for all the positivity and hope we see you again soon.

reviews.review_text: I ordered before from UberEats and the pizza was amazing. My sister then brought me here for my birthday and the experience was beyond expectations: the interior is really pretty; pizza was delicious, and service was really good too   We ordered the veggie pizza and the prosciutto and arugula pizza as well as some brussel sprouts on the side. The tiramisu is also to die for - soft and creamy! I noticed they have brunch so would love to come back again to try more of their creations.
Great place for food and drinks. Love the Negroni and the spritzs. For food the pork belly, wagyu beef, pizzas etc.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you had a great time with us Eduardo!

reviews.review_text: This resto is quite new and I pass it often. Do my wife and I decided to try it out today. We were not disappointed. It is a relaxing unpretentious place with great food and superb pizza (My wife is a pizza fanatic and said it is probably the best pizza in town). The staff are great and discrete, which is nice. Highly recommended.

Came here in October for a friend s birthday and it was a very wonderful experience. Due to Covid, there weren t many tables occupied when we went but all the tables were very well distanced and we got a cute corner table. The thin pizzas were liked by all of us and it was just a nice vibe and environment to be in. Would come again in the future!

I love Sprezzatura! Great menu and ambience, friendly staff. The food is delicious (try the porcini lasagna), and while the food and drink menu isnt exhaustive, its thoughtful and not just standard Italian food. Perfect for a date night!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks Emma!

reviews.review_text: Wow this is some yummy pizza. Super thin crust and simple toppings. So good!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Alexander, thanks for the great feedback, hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: We had dinner here recently. We had bruschetta, salads, pizza, and pork belly and all were fantastic. The service was great and all staff were very friendly. Would highly recommend.
Great food, great service and cool vibe!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you Alina!

reviews.review_text: Great happy hour if you go between 3 and 5! Lovely staff and great pizza. Ive had some of the other items on the main but Id stick with the pizzas. Also, the bruschetta could be better, not mad on the thin slices of bread!

Super family friendly restaurant with a wide variety of delicious dishes. Spacious venue and very modern but homely decor. The pizzas in particular are a good size, extremely favourful and of honest quality ingredients. Service was friendly and efficient. Look forward to returning soon.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks so much for taking the time give such a great review Florence. Hope to see you again soon!

reviews.review_text: Always great service and delicious pizzas!
Great food and really good service.
We had dinner here. The food was delicious, atmosphere is really nice and cozy, and service was great too. My favourite was the mushroom pizza. The tiramisu was really good too and big portion.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks  for the great review Dorsa, we really love the Mushroom Pizza too!

reviews.review_text: We had a great dining experience here! The restaurant was beautifully designed and nicely decorated. The waitress was extremely friendly and the service was quick. We enjoyed the Italian sauage/rapini pizza and mushroom pizza, which we found to be very tasty. We will definitely be coming back!
My favourite pizza in town. Super thin crust, non greasy. My top picks are margarita and truffle mushroom pizzas. Meatballs are incredible too. Love this place!
Foods so yummy, they also threw in a free garlic bread which was awesome

I dont give this 5 stars lightly.  In all likelihood, this is the first 5 star review Ive given. The service staff GIVE A HOOT. The food is made with love - and it shows. If i say any more, thisll be a spoiler, not a review. Check out the awesome happy-hour. You cant go wrong with anything on the menu. Hot tip - the Chef makes a peach habanero hot sauce that is out of this world. At some point theyll sell it, but i digress. Ask for it and love it.
Great food. Real Italian style pizza.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Glad you enjoyed your time with us David!

reviews.review_text: Went with my husband last Friday to check this place out. We liked the ambience and enjoyed happy hour. I recommend the pork pizza and the pannacotta. Hope this place is successful because it s a nice edition to the neighbourhood. Kid friendly.

Decided to visit recently after hearing good things from a couple of friends. Decor is casual and welcoming. Wonderful menu that offers ample choice for all, and something a little different to what other Italian restaurants are doing in Vancouver. Price points are fantastic for the quality of food on offer. Will definitely be visiting again!
